resources.string: Report your card as lost or stolen
Your replacement card is \nscheduled to arrive by %1$s.
We\'re sorry, please try again later
It\'s been %1$s days since your card was sent to you by post. Activate it now.
Your PayPal Cash Card has been returned to us. Please confirm your address so we can send you your card again.
Your PayPal Cash Card has been returned to us for the second time. Call Customer Service on %1$s so we can send you your card.
Pro Tip: Once your card has been saved, use it to make purchases in shops.
If you haven\'t received your card, call Customer Service on %1$s.
We\'ve detected your card. We\'re now ready to activate your card.
